info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: I wish I could stayed a month but unfortunately someone already booked. The place is very hommy 3 balconies and huge 3 washrooms. My son enjoys this place, he freely walked in the rooms. I wish to visit again next year.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: After living for a month, I will say that this is the best service and conditions for this price. The area is clean, calm and very safe. The apartment is very spacious. All conditions are available, including a washing machine! It’s great that there are many shops, restaurants and even 1 bar nearby. The owner and caretaker will make your life as carefree and simple as possible. The only negative, not of the apartment, but of Dhaka, is mosquitoes, but in the store opposite you can buy a fumigator, which I advise you to do on the first day. Also bring earplugs, the area is quiet compared to most, but the windows in Dhaka apartments do not isolate sound 100%. Having lived in other apartments in Dhaka, for comparison I understand how good this option was for the money, it’s a pity that it was not possible to extend it, since someone booked the accommodation for the following dates.

rating_comment:
it was the best experience l had ,simply remarkable except a little honking noise from the streets below , that's beyond the control of the host l guess

an engineer professor living in the USA

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This was my second time stay in this house. Of course it was safe and comfortable. This time room was much cleaner then previous. I will recommend this place for short and long time stay and will stay next time also.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Mohammed Saiful Alam, ist sehr netter Gastgeber. The apartment is in a perfect location. The caretaker is available 24/7. He took care of every little thing you need. I also filled up very safely. I can recommend without a doubt. If I travel to Dhaka next time, I will definitely be staying here.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
Great value for money! Spacious Airbnb, centrally located in Uttara with lots of restaurants, cafes and stores nearby. Saiful, brother Shofiq and caretaker Nurul are very helpful and responsive for any issues that arise. Caretaker is happy to help support with just about any task.
Heads up: if you’re a light sleeper, bring ear plugs as the neighborhood is very loud.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
I am satisfied overall. Host was responsive. Check In was smooth and flexible without any hassle. 24 hours caretaker was available and helpful. Accommodation was Safe and secure. House interior was little old with little dusty but it was fully okay.
Two things I have to mention. One is place was noisy due to just it was beside of 2 ways road and till late night lot of vehicles noise may hamper your silence. Second is mosquitoes. Even killer spray couldn’t get rid of them. Should use net to get rid of mosquitoes.
Restaurants and other necessary shops were just in a short distance. So place is convenient to move.
So I will definitely recommend this place.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed over a week
Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Enjoyed every moment of my stay. Caretaker Nur Islam is fantastic. If you need anything, he is there for you. If you choose to stay here, I can guarantee you would fall in love with this place. All the convenient stores are nearby and the neighborhood is one of the safest places in Dhaka. I would definitely recommend this place to my friends and family. Can't wait to come back next year.

rating_comment: It was great hospitality there. Really appreciate. I came from London and was little worried about staying in Dhaka. But the location and apartment is totally safe and sound. The guard was also helpfull. Was always there when we need him. Total 5star staying.
